title: Fmr. Trump Economic Advisor on Fed Nomination Process, Trump Economy
description: Stephen Moore, Former Trump Economic Advisor and Unleash Prosperity Co-Founder, joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss the Federal Reserve's December rate cut, US inflation and economic conditions, the Fed selection process and who President Trump may pick as the next Fed Chair, and more. Moore also calls the "massive spending bill" passed before the end of President Trump's first term a "big mistake." Bloomberg Economics US and Canada Economist Stuart Paul also joins the discussion. Moore and Paul speak with Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
